short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zero Two Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Zero Two background. Zero Two wallpaper background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle the Zero Two wallpaper each time a new tab is opened.
2. Set a random Zero Two background or select your favorite from the wallpaper choice panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Convenient links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel customization for faster website access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to additional themes.
12. Streamlined sharing to social networks.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Instant access to gaming portals.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Zero Two new tab.
